item.description:
Let's put down the cards and dice and enjoy the sunshine with some outdoor games, like:

  • Bocce ball
  • Badminton
  • Croquet
  • Frisbee

If you have outdoor games to offer, please bring them.

We try to position ourselves partially in the shade, but come prepared for the weather and the sun. Feel free to bring a blanket and/or a chair and sort of snack or beverage you might like while we're on the common.

We'll cross our fingers for good weather, but if the forecast doesn't look promising, we'll be in contact.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be by the Washington Arch.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Outdoor Games on the Common
